English: Can you help me carry these boxes?
She bought a blue dress for the party.
Spanish: Ella compró un vestido azul para la fiesta.

English: He has ten pencils in his bag.
Spanish: Él tiene diez lápices en su mochila.

English: Please write down the numbers one to ten.
Spanish: Por favor, anota los números de uno a diez.

English: My brother is seven years older than me.
Spanish: Mi hermano es siete años mayor que yo.

English: I am counting the birds outside.
